name: Rad Rat Infinity
description:
FULL GAME AND STORY AVAILABLE NOW ON GOOGLE PLAY STORE!
==> Play Store link
(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PratkarotatKajaanista.rottapel...)

You've come a long way escaping the tax bear, but he's catching up to you as you've entered a local planet's atmosphere. Mayhaps you are able to outrun the bear with your custom motorcycle.

Follow us on Twitter! ==> Twitter

Listen to the OST made by Otto "Hunts" Kemppainen! ==> SoundCloud

Font by Tup Wanders ==> Evil Empire

This game was made as a part of Developing a Mobile Game course within 250 work hours.
